name: Papa's Cluckeria to Go!
storyline: The Chicken Sandwich Wars have begun! When Papa Louie opens the first chicken sandwich restaurant in Oilseed Springs, rival chefs suddenly appear in town to give Papa Louie some competition!
summary: Craft tasty chicken sandwiches and swirled slushes in Papa's Cluckeria to Go!, a strategy simulator. You'll be in charge of running Papa's Cluckeria, where you'll bread, batter, and fry foods to craft a variety of different sandwiches. Pile the sandwiches high with toppings and sauces, and create refreshing swirled slushes to serve your picky customers. Work your way through the holidays as you serve seasonal sandwiches and slushes, unlock new ingredients, and earn Daily Specials with delicious sandwich recipes - and try to outlast your competition!
